\"Ach! Hans, Run!\".name: "Ach! Hans, Run!"
\"Ach! Hans, Run!\".text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may say "Ach Hans, run It's the . . ." and the name of a creature card. If you do, search your library for a card with that name, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library. That creature gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.
